techniques.title: The 9 cell
techniques.text: If a 9-cell is present, then all adjacent cells must be colored black.

techniques.title: The 0 cell
techniques.text: If a 0-cell is present, then all adjacent cells must be colored white.

techniques.title: Corner 4
techniques.text: If a 4-cell is in one of the corners, then all 4 adjacent cells must be colored black.

techniques.title: Wall 6
techniques.text: If a 6-cell is adjacent to one of the walls, then all 6 adjacent cells must be colored black.
